representation_information.name: HDF4, Hierarchical Data Format, Version 4 and earlier
representation_information.description: A physical file format for storing scientific data. The data structure types that HDF4 supports are Scientific Data Sets, Raster Images (General, 8-bit, 24-bit APIs), color palettes, text entries, and Vdatas and Vgroups.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
